description:
Makeover unlimited WeeMees with 450+ FREE items! Try out the latest fashions, hair, make-up, and more. Vote for your favorite WeeMees – daily winners earn exclusive prizes!

***WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING***
Over 10,700 5-star reviews, see why you should download WeeMee Avatar Creator.

“One of the best games I have and so addicting too! Get it I love it and I think you will too!” – A QPON???

“I wish it had 1million stars! Best app ever. WeeWorld you have out-done yourselves!!!!” – Onceat

“WeeMee is a really cool app because i can vote for other peoples WeeMee's and i can send them to my friends.” – Sesamesee123

“You get to make your personalized avatar while making one that looks like you you can change the color of some things like hair and such I love wee mee” – Maddy234567890

***HOW TO PLAY ***
* Make unlimited WeeMees with over 450 ITEMS INCLUDED FOR FREE, offering millions of creative combinations
 
* Play the Fame Game - a daily competition where you can vote for your favorite WeeMees.  
 
* Enter the Fame Game to see if you’re the best dressed WeeMee of the day! Winning WeeMees earn a one-of-a-kind prize. Vote, share, and get your friends to vote for you!
 
* Power up your WeeMee style with the Closets that include specialized premium collections and bonus FREE closets.

* Snap photos of your WeeMees and share them with your friends via Messages, Facebook, Twitter, or email

If you upgraded from version 2.0 to version 3.0, here are a few known fixes:
- Missing closets? Go to Shop > My Closets > Restore Purchased Closets. You will NOT be charged again.

***ABOUT WEEWORLD***
WeeWorld makes games that inspire social creativity and more than 57 million WeeMees have been created to date on our apps and WeeWorld.com. WeeMee Avatar Creator provides a positive environment to share your imagination and have fun with friends. WeeMee is absolutely free to play, but you can purchase new items with real money in our shop. These items help boost creativity and enhance game play. An in-app purchase requires an Apple ID and can be disabled at any time.

Privacy is an issue we take very seriously. To learn about how we protect your privacy, read our Privacy Policy. http://m.weeworld.com/mobileprivacy.aspx
